rows.label: qst200213_msg0001
rows.name:
So you see, girl called Harghal hire
Jaruru to come here and collect
three type of medicine herb.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0002
rows.name: Harghal?!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0003
rows.name:
And do you know what these
herbs are for?

rows.label: qst200213_msg0004
rows.name:
Herbs for making special Pollen Orb!
Make body fill with twice as much
energy as usual!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah, one of those old Nopon
concoctions...

rows.label: qst200213_msg0006
rows.name:
I believe those are contraband in
a number of nations, are they not?

rows.label: qst200213_msg0007
rows.name: What? They're illegal?

rows.label: qst200213_msg0008
rows.name:
Pollen Orbs are known for their
addictive nature. Excessive use can
cause terrible effects to the body.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0009
rows.name:
As such, I seem to recall trading
in them is entirely forbidden
throughout Superbia.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0010
rows.name: Friends quite right...

rows.label: qst200213_msg0011
rows.name:
Harghal know that Pollen Orb
trading forbidden, but sell for
high price anyway.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0012
rows.name:
I see...
Thank you for your honesty, Jaruru.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0013
rows.name:
Jaruru overcome with guilt at sight
of flame of justice in eyes of friend.
Not take on dirty job like this again!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0014
rows.name:
Could you tell us where these
deals are taking place? Harghal
should be there, right?

rows.label: qst200213_msg0015
rows.name: Jaruru not know where Harghal is now.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0016
rows.name:
But plan was to sneak herbs in among
other cargo and have sailor at Port
Ananyam transport them.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0017
rows.name:
Port Ananyam, huh...
Do you know this sailor's name?

rows.label: qst200213_msg0018
rows.name: Name of Tuvarri.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0019
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]All right, then!
Tuvarri, we're coming for you!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0101
rows.name:
Look me in the eyes!
These are the eyes of justice!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0102
rows.name:
Now, tell me honestly. Are you really
just a traveling merchant?

rows.label: qst200213_msg0103
rows.name:
J-Jaruru not doing anything
suspicious...

rows.label: qst200213_msg0104
rows.name:
Are you sure?
Can you swear on your own soul?!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0105
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-mehhhhh....!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0106
rows.name:
If there's something going on here,
we need to know about it.

rows.label: qst200213_msg0107
rows.name:
Don't worry. No matter what the
situation, we won't treat you unfairly.
I'm here to help!

rows.label: qst200213_msg0108
rows.name:
Meh-meh-mehhhhh...
All right...

rows.label: qst200213_msg0109
rows.name: Jaruru tell friends everything...
